description: Sending in a pair of jeans has always been considered the ultimate style, and now with BD Crag Denim, you can crush in stretchy comfort. Featuring our V11 fit with tapered leg, the Crag Denim provides performance at a value, with great stretch for on-the-wall moves, and durability thanks to 10.5 oz denim. Harness compatible, low-pro pockets and hardware keep the fit right, and an integrated brush pocket holds it down when it’s time to clean the holds and suss the moves pre-send.
name: Black Diamond Crag Denim Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens
